Content: @tradeplayer  follow the steps in this guide to make a claim

Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content: https://support.komodoplatform.com/en/support/solutions/articles/29000029932-agama-security-announcement

Author: tradeplayer#5932
Content: This blockchain stuff is never wanting for excitement.  Hopefully you ballers at Komodo are on your game. I submitted  my form and am waiting to get my coins back...

Author: gcharang#6833
Content:
@tradeplayer 
After submitting the form, please read this document carefully to understand the refund process. https://support.komodoplatform.com/support/solutions/articles/29000029973-steps-to-reclaim-funds-after-the-agama-incident
Summary: We have sent a small amount of KMD to your compromised address as confirmation that we have moved those funds. Send all the funds from the compromised address to the New address you have submitted in the form to prove ownership.

1) login to Verus Agama using compromised seed: https://support.komodoplatform.com/support/solutions/articles/29000029966-logging-into-verus-agama-with-an-existing-private-key-or-seed
2) send all the funds to the new address you specified in the form
